Following chart shows activity in GitHub data source. It is based on comparing the number of opened and closed reviews grouped by quarters. A review is equivalent to a pull request in GitHub terminology.

\begin{tabular}{p{7cm} p{5cm}}
	\vspace{0pt} 
	\includegraphics[scale=.35]{figs/github_submitted_github_closed_general.eps}
	& 
	\vspace{0pt}
	\begin{tabular}{l|r|r|}%
		\bfseries Period & \bfseries Opened & \bfseries Closed % specify table head
		\csvreader[head to column names]{data/github_submitted_github_closed_general.csv}{}% use head of csv as column names
		{\\\labels & \submitted & \closed}
	\end{tabular}
\end{tabular}
